question: How do I create an account?
answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage and fill out the required information. You'll receive a confirmation email to verify your account.

question: How can I post a job?
answer: After logging in, navigate to the 'Post a Job' section, fill out the job details, and click 'Submit.' Your job will be reviewed before being published.

question: What types of jobs can I post?
answer: You can post full-time, part-time, contract, and freelance positions. Ensure toear details about the job type in your posting.

question: Is there a fee for posting jobs?
answer: We offer both free and premium job postings. Free postings will remain visible for 30 days, while premium optionsditional visibility and features.

question: How can I apply for a job?
answer: To apply for a job, click on the job listing, read the details, and click the 'Apply Now' button. You will be prompted to upload your resume andy additional information.

question: Can I edit or delete my job postings?
answer: Yes, you can edit or delete your job postings from your account dashboard under the 'My Jobs' section.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click on the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page. Enter your email address, and you will receive a link to reset your password.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact our customer support team through the 'Contact Us' page or by emailing support@gethired.com.
